scale(double, double) - Method in class goodsky.GameObject
Scale the GameObject's image.
scale(double) - Method in class goodsky.GameObject
 
setAnimatedImage(String, int, int, int) - Method in class goodsky.GameObject
Load in a string of images to make an animated image! This will load in the designated number of frames from the file, this command expects the frames of the image to be vertical, with the first on the top and then scans down to gather the rest of the frames.
setAnimationSpeed(double) - Method in class goodsky.GameObject
Set the speed of the animation.

Set the background color of the screen.
setBackgroundImage(String) - Static method in class goodsky.gs
Set the background image if you choose to use an image for the background.
setBackgroundOff() - Static method in class goodsky.gs
Only use this command if you really know what you are doing.
setBoundingBox(int, int) - Method in class goodsky.GameObject
This function will set the bounding box used for collision to constant values.
setCameraPosition(int, int) - Static method in class goodsky.gs
Position the virtual camera at position x and y.
setCollisionGroup(int) - Method in class goodsky.GameObject
Use this method to set the collision group that this object is in.
setCollisionOn(boolean) - Method in class goodsky.GameObject
This function will turn collision on or off for this object.
setDepth(int) - Method in class goodsky.GameObject
Set the render depth.

setFrame(int) - Method in class goodsky.GameObject

setMaxClimableSlop(double) - Method in class goodsky.GameObject
Set the max slope that this object can go up when using sliding collision (between 0.0 [flat] and 1.0 [vertical])
setScreenSize(int, int) - Static method in class goodsky.gs
This will change the size of the screen that we run the program on.
setScreenTitle(String) - Static method in class goodsky.gs
 
setShape(int, int, Color) - Method in class goodsky.GameObject

slideCollisionCircle(double, double, double) - Method in class goodsky.GameObject
Try to move the object the amount specified in the x and y direction with a circle collision bound.

sync() - Static method in class goodsky.gs
This will render all our game objects to the screen and wait a certain amount to keep stable FPS.
